nitf_FileSecurity Struct Reference

#include <FileSecurity.h>

Detailed Description

This class keeps track of the file security info.

The file security struct has a number of fields pertaining to security information from the nitf file. You may access these by their longnames, as they are declared, or you may use the shorthand macros provided above
